job.title: Software Engineer I
job.description: Why APCON?At APCON, we are committed to setting the industry standard by engineering best-in-class network solutions. We're talented, driven, and willing to roll up our sleeves to make what seems impossible possible. As our industry grows, we are rapidly expanding and looking for talented, committed, and motivated employees to thrive in our fast-paced work environment. Join us and work with industry-leading hardware and software engineers as we develop some of the most innovative technologies shaping the future of network monitoring.Purpose Of JobThe Software Engineer I will be responsible for writing Enterprise Application code in a team environment which includes research, design, debug, and test for next generation network management software systems while contributing to the existing product line.ResponsibilitiesDesign, implement, debug, and test server-side software for network management softwareWork closely with firmware design teamWork closely with the quality assurance group for testingResponsible for creating written documentation for his/her own software developmentDevelop feature enhancements and provide development support for existing product linesWorks in both an independent and team member environment to meet multiple product release cyclesQualifications And RequirementsHands on experience developing applications in C/C++Proficient in object oriented analysis, design and development techniquesWorking knowledge of RPC, REST API or other programming interfacesKnowledge of golang and QT framework a PlusExperience working with databases like MySQLKnowledge of Angular/JavaScript/HTML5 a PlusCore CompetenciesKnowledge of Version Control practices, especially SVNAbility to prioritize and be flexible in a fast-paced environmentStrong interpersonal skills; ability to communicate professionally across the organizationAbility to maintain a high level of confidentiality and professionalismAbility to manage, and schedule time to meet deadlinesEducationBS degree (BSEE or BSCS strongly preferred, MSCS a plus) or the equivalent in training and experience2+ years of programming experience (C/C++, REST)BenefitsMedical, dental and vision insuranceCompany-paid short and long term disability Flexible spending accountsHealthy work-life balance and generous paid time off programRetirement savings matchProfessional development programVolunteer time off and employee assistance planCollaborative and innovative work environmentOn-site exercise facilityAPCON is a drug-free workplace and EEO Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, religion, natural origin, disability, veteran status, age, marital status, pregnancy, genetic information, or other legally protected status. Offers are contingent on the successful completion of pre-employment drug and background screenings. Please note that we follow Federal Guidelines regarding prohibited substances, even for those legal at the state level.
